individual unit on each floor, 
High ceiling, Windy. 

Partial Furnished, 
asking $28k (Subject to GST)
Fully furnished can be arranged.
Available 23rd Oct 23
(Sample photos as shown) 

Uncover the beauty of luxury living at its height. Luxurious way of living in a spacious duplex home, high above ground, surrounded by lush gardens of green and a backdrop of blue sky. 

This 32 storey development, 
comprising of 56 apartments, 
will take your breath away every day with a stunning panoramic view of the surrounding city-view. 
A spacious sky terrace, a glass passenger lift, 
a 40-metre swimming pool and a cigar terrace are fine touches to your abode, 
which has a ceiling height of six-metres. 

Vertical living in Singapore can’t get more exciting than this. SkyPark was innovatively conceptualized to turn what would have been constraints being the inherent problems posed by a small plot of high density land in the city into an intelligent multi-layered architectural response. ... 

The intention was to design houses in a residential tower. Experiencing the 'gardens' from within the apartment, the space does actually create a "grounded" sensation, if not for the city skyline beyond. The jury was very impressed by the way in which the architect was able to integrate these design strategies successfully to create meaningful spaces within a coherent piece of architecture. 

Facilities, 
40m Lap pool 
Gym 
BBQ area 
Function room 
24hrs security

Vertical living in Singapore can’t get more exciting than this. SkyPark was innovatively conceptualized to turn what would have been constraints being the inherent problems posed by a small plot of high density land in the city into an intelligent multi-layered architectural response. ...

Description:
'Please Call / Whatsapp / Sms : +6593808038

Partial Furnished, 
asking $28k (Subject to GST)
Fully furnished can be arranged.
Available 23rd Feb 23
(Sample photos as shown) 

Uncover the beauty of luxury living at its height. Luxurious way of living in a spacious duplex home, high above ground, surrounded by lush gardens of green and a backdrop of blue sky. 

This 32 storey development, 
comprising of 56 apartments, 
will take your breath away every day with a stunning panoramic view of the surrounding city-view. 
A spacious sky terrace, a glass passenger lift, 
a 40-metre swimming pool and a cigar terrace are fine touches to your abode, 
which has a ceiling height of six-metres. 

Vertical living in Singapore can’t get more exciting than this. SkyPark was innovatively conceptualized to turn what would have been constraints being the inherent problems posed by a small plot of high density land in the city into an intelligent multi-layered architectural response. ... 

The intention was to design houses in a residential tower. Experiencing the 'gardens' from within the apartment, the space does actually create a "grounded" sensation, if not for the city skyline beyond. The jury was very impressed by the way in which the architect was able to integrate these design strategies successfully to create meaningful spaces within a coherent piece of architecture. 

Facilities, 
40m Lap pool 
Gym 
BBQ area 
Function room 
24hrs security 
Golf bag storage '

Title: Lease take over from 24 sep, New furnished hdb
Description:
'**Looking for Family to take our lease, New HDB**

**Subletting of one known person allowed**
Hi everyone,

We are moving out of Singapore due to personal reasons and hence looking for a family, couples who can take over our lease which is ending Feb 2025  (as we had 2 yrs lease). We are currently staying in a fully furnished 3 bedroom HDB in Punggol area.

Owner is very nice and Kind. She has a full support with us. Neighbours are very nice and always smiling and ready to help.

Below are the facilities available :

A living room and dining area
well equipped kitchen, 
3 bed rooms - fully furnished with TV in common rooms
2 toilets & bathrooms separate with utility area.

Start date / Move In date - Sep 24/25 2023

The hdb house is new generation located at a prominent location with nearby amenities as below 

1. Indian Grocery shops 3 stops by bus and 7 mins walkable to other indian shop 
2. Five min walk to sheng siong and Fairprirce which are open 24x7
3. Two mins walk to Bus stop to catch Bus 3,136,381,386,83,85,84,34 every 5 mins to connect Tampanies and changi airport (straight bus) and MRTs stops
4. 7-8 mins walk to punggol mrt and bus interchange
5. Many international schools and pre schools available 
6. Children play area 
7. Pcf infant and preachool full day care at ground floor

Rental :  $3850 per month non negotiable. 

Have starhub internet connection if need to use.

Deposit is $7700

Before handover, Aircon servicing will be done for 2 quarters

Please leave a comment if you are interested. 

Thank you.'

Title: SkyPark @ Somerset, Bungalow in the Sky Duplex with Sky Garden 4bedrooms
Location: 22 St Thomas WalkRiver Valley, Central Singapore
Description:
'Please Call / Whatsapp / Sms : +6593808038 
Sam Ong for viewing. Thanks. 

PropNex Associate Division Director 
Cea Reg : R016315I Mobile / Whatsapp / Sms : +6593808038 


SkyPark @ Somerset, 
22 St Thomas Walk
4+1 bedrooms, 3,347sqft High floor,
Bungalow in the Sky Duplex layout, 800sqft Sky Garden on every floor, 
Private Balcony with Jacuzzi, 
individual unit on each floor, 
High ceiling, Windy. 

Partial Furnished, 
asking $28k (Subject to GST)
Fully furnished can be arranged.
Available 23rd Feb 23
(Sample photos as shown) 

Uncover the beauty of luxury living at its height. Luxurious way of living in a spacious duplex home, high above ground, surrounded by lush gardens of green and a backdrop of blue sky. 

This 32 storey development, 
comprising of 56 apartments, 
will take your breath away every day with a stunning panoramic view of the surrounding city-view. 
A spacious sky terrace, a glass passenger lift, 
a 40-metre swimming pool and a cigar terrace are fine touches to your abode, 
which has a ceiling height of six-metres. 

Vertical living in Singapore can’t get more exciting than this. SkyPark was innovatively conceptualized to turn what would have been constraints being the inherent problems posed by a small plot of high density land in the city into an intelligent multi-layered architectural response. ... 

The intention was to design houses in a residential tower. Experiencing the 'gardens' from within the apartment, the space does actually create a "grounded" sensation, if not for the city skyline beyond. The jury was very impressed by the way in which the architect was able to integrate these design strategies successfully to create meaningful spaces within a coherent piece of architecture. 

Facilities, 
40m Lap pool 
Gym 
BBQ area 
Function room 
24hrs security 
Golf bag storage '
